title: U.S. Sen. Warren Leads Lawmakers to Push Administration on Crypto-Backed Terrorism
description: U.S. Sen. Elizabeth Warren (D-Mass.) led more than a hundred lawmakers in demanding top officials share their plans for heading off crypto-financed terrorism.

title: SBF Trial: A Witness Contrasts Sam Bankman-Fried's House Testimony With FTX's Dangerous Secrets
description: Former FTX lobbyist Eliora Katz appeared to mostly be on the stand to allow prosecutors to bring attention to Bankman-Fried's tweets and House testimony, and how they differed from the secret reality that led to the crypto exchange's demise.

title: Chainalysis: Central, Northern, and Western Europe reported to be second largest crypto economy this year
description: In an Oct. 18 report from Chainalysis, Central, Northern, and Western Europe were said to account for 17.6% of global transaction volume between July 2022 and June 2023.

title: Analyst Expects BTC to Retrace by -30% to $20K, Will It?
